participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, enjoys expressing himself through various hobbies.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat reserved, grappling with her current situation but hopeful for the future.
participant_2.background: i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

content.text: No I have not. I am in a juvenile detention center now. Very sad.
i am sorry to hear that .
Yeah. But my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow morning.
i am sorry to hear that .
I live with my family in a small town. Where do you live?
i live in the city , but i do not have a lot of time to travel .
I want to travel all around the world! I will be released in about a month and will travel!
i live in the city , i love to travel .
We are from Alaska. Where are you from?
i am from , , but i live in the city .
i live in the city , but i do not have a lot of money .
